purpleculture_pinyin:
tí
to cry; to weep aloud; to crow; to hoot
плакать; громко рыдать; кукарекать; кричать
purpleculture_info:
Antonyms: 笑
Pictophonetic: 帝 indicates the sound; 口 (mouth) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
啼哭 [ tí kū ]: to cry; to wail
啼笑皆非 [ tí xiào jiē fēi ]: lit. not to know whether to laugh or cry (idiom); between laughter and tears
悲啼 [ bēi tí ]: to wail with grief; plaintive cry
啼饥号寒 [ tí jī háo hán ]: hunger cries and cold roars (idiom); wretched poverty
哭哭啼啼 [ kū ku tí tí ]: to weep endlessly; interminable wailing
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 口 [ kǒu ] mouth; entrance, gate, opening
    • 帝 [ dì ] supreme ruler, emperor; god
heisig_chinese_memo: A sovereign is inevitably murdered by his successor and here we see his mouth as he weeps aloud with a knife to his throat before the moment of death.
Ru_trainchinese: tí: (графема) плакать (в голос), рыдать; (о некоторых птицах и животных) петь, кричать, каркать, кукарекать, выть
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: A sovereign is inevitably murdered by his successor and here we see his mouth as he weeps aloud with a knife to his throat before the moment of death.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the " mouth ", the sound of " di ". There is no " cry " in "Shuowen", "mouth": "Ah, horn. From the mouth, the sound." Duan Yucai's note: "The vulgar is a cry." The original meaning of " cry " is to cry, that is, to cry out loud. cry. Such as "Rituals. "Si Xi Li": "Nai Zuo, the master cry, the brother cry." "Chajin": "There are those who are too on the river, and the baby screams at the river where people lead the baby and want to go to the river, the baby screams, and the person asks the reason, saying: "This father is good at traveling.""

" Cry " also means that birds and beasts call. Such as "Zuo Zhuan. "Eight Years of Zhuang Gong": "Shoot it, hog people stand and cry. Public fear, team (falling) in the car." "Han Feizi. "Said Lin": "Mengsun hunted and made Qin Xiba return home, and his mother screamed afterwards, and Qin Xiba stayed with him."

" Cry " also refers to tears. For example, Wang Changling of the Tang Dynasty "Farewell to Li Puzhijing": "My younger brother is fishing and hunting near Zhuang, and I send a book to several lines."
humanum_short_description_en: From the " mouth ", the sound of " di ". The original meaning is to cry, that is, cry out loud.
humanum_full_description:
從「口」，「帝」聲。《說文》無「啼」，〈口部〉：「嗁，號也。从口，虒聲。」段玉裁注：「俗作啼。」「啼」的本義是啼哭，即出聲地哭。如《儀禮．既夕禮》：「乃卒，主人啼，兄弟哭。」《呂氏春秋．察今》：「有過於江上者，見人方引嬰兒而欲投之江中，嬰兒啼，人問其故，曰：『此其父善游。』」

　　「啼」也表示鳥獸鳴叫。如《左傳．莊公八年》：「射之，豕人立而啼。公懼，隊（墜）于車。」《韓非子．說林》：「孟孫獵得麑，使秦西巴持之歸，其母隨之而啼，秦西巴弗忍而與之。」

　　「啼」還借指眼淚。如唐代王昌齡〈別李浦之京〉：「小弟鄰莊尚漁獵，一封書寄數行啼。」
humanum_short_description: 從「口」，「帝」聲。本義是啼哭，即出聲地哭。

從「 口 」，「 帝 」聲。《說文》無「 啼 」，〈口部〉：「嗁，號也。从口，虒聲。」段玉裁注：「俗作啼。」「 啼 」的本義是啼哭，即出聲地哭。如《儀禮．既夕禮》：「乃卒，主人啼，兄弟哭。」《呂氏春秋．察今》：「有過於江上者，見人方引嬰兒而欲投之江中，嬰兒啼，人問其故，曰：『此其父善游。』」 「 啼 」也表示鳥獸鳴叫。如《左傳．莊公八年》：「射之，豕人立而啼。公懼，隊（墜）于車。」《韓非子．說林》：「孟孫獵得麑，使秦西巴持之歸，其母隨之而啼，秦西巴弗忍而與之。」 「 啼 」還借指眼淚。如唐代王昌齡〈別李浦之京〉：「小弟鄰莊尚漁獵，一封書寄數行啼。」
From the " mouth", the sound of " di". There is no " cry" in "Shuowen", "mouth": "Ah, horn. From the mouth, the sound." Duan Yucai's note: "The vulgar is a cry." The original meaning of " cry" is to cry, that is, to cry out loud. cry. Such as "Rituals. "Si Xi Li": "Nai Zuo, the master cry, the brother cry." "Chajin": "There are those who are too on the river, and the baby screams at the river where people lead the baby and want to go to the river, the baby screams, and the person asks the reason, saying: "This father is good at traveling."" " Cry" also means that birds and beasts call. Such as "Zuo Zhuan. "Eight Years of Zhuang Gong": "Shoot it, hog people stand and cry. Public fear, team (falling) in the car." "Han Feizi. "Said Lin": "Mengsun hunted and made Qin Xiba return home, and his mother screamed afterwards, and Qin Xiba stayed with him." " Cry" also refers to tears. For example, Wang Changling of the Tang Dynasty "Farewell to Li Puzhijing": "My younger brother is fishing and hunting near Zhuang, and I send a book to several lines."

啼字的基本解释

啼
tí
哭，出声地哭：啼哭。啼泣。悲啼。啼笑皆非。
鸟兽叫：啼鸣。啼叫。虎啸猿啼。
笑

啼字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tí］
［《廣韻》杜奚切，平齊，定。］
“嗁1”的今字。亦作“嗁1”。“諦2”的被通假字。亦作“謕1”。
(1)悲哀的哭泣。
(2)借指眼泪。
(3)鸣叫。

啼字的英文翻译

◎ 啼
caw, crow, cry, ululate, weep loud

啼字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　啼； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页197第01
〔古文〕謕【說文】同嗁。【禮·喪大記】主人啼。【穀梁傳·僖十年】麗姬下堂而啼。

啼字的起名意思

暂无。

[①]［tí］
["Guangyun" Du Xiqie, level and set. ]
The present word for "嗁1". Also known as "嗁1". The false word for "谛2". Also known as "謕1".
(1) Sad crying.
(2) By means of tears.
(3) Tweet.

гл.
1) плакать (в голос); рыдать; голосить
老人儿啼 старики рыдали
2) кричать, каркать (о птицах); визжать, выть (о зверях)
豕人立而啼 кабан завизжал, встав на задние ноги (по-человечьи)

啼猿 кричащая обезьяна
